title: After Dark
description: It wasn’t supposed to be this way.  I’ve spent my nights alone because that’s the best way for a predator to hunt their prey.  A chance encounter in a small diner in the middle of the night changed everything.  He was meant to be my victim, but he turned into something more...  From the moment I laid eyes on him, I was infatuated. He drew me in vastly different than all of those who came before him.  He’s a beautiful creature with the most delicate and fascinating features I’ve ever laid eyes on.  I needed to own his touch; to feel him run his fingers over my skin. I wanted him to consume me...
author: Yolanda Olson
